Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • Main

  • public class Main
extends javafx.application.Application
    The main class for a simple 2D videogame. This is the top-level class in the project, and utilizes JavaFX canvases to draw a map, as well as player and goal objects.
    Version:
    0.3 (2017.01.20)
    Author:
    Kent Daleng
